label: I-26 Photo 0281
description: House-like structure in dilapidated condition (side view) on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26).  Dirt lot in foreground. Address: 739 Meeting Street. Surveyor notations on back of photo:  "Dkt.: 10.503.  Property owner: Eula Chitwood.  Tract: 61.  Station: 5909+30 Rt.  Date: Feb. 20, 1963.  In R/W - Bought."  [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
